member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.AskAnExpertFunctionText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You can always ask me to connect to an expert, an expert will connect with you:\n Ask an Expert..

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.AskAnExpertText1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ask An Expert.

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.AskAnExpertText2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to We have our experts to assist you better on any of your questions.\nYou can always say:\nAsk an Expert.

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.BotName
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to FAQ Bot.

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.BulletedList
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to - 401k\r- Travel Benifits\r- Leave Policy\r- Health Benifits.

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.BulletedQuestionText
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to - May I know my 401k policy?
- May I know the Travel Policy of the org?
- What about the Leave Policy?
- What are the Health benefits?.

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.CollectFeedback
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Answer the questions suggesting how we can improve our services or just leave the comments..

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.FeedbackText1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to We Would love to hear a feedback from you on how we have performed today..

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.FeedbackText2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to If your experience is unhappy give us the details you have for your question,like your assigned ticket #, one of our experts will connect with you..

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.FunctionCardText1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hello!.I am your friendly HR Question and Answer BOT. \nType anything related to HR topics and see how I answer them back..

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.FunctionCardText2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to You can ask me questions on the following topics and I will assist you in answering them..

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.FunctionTopicsText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Ask me questions like:.

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.MessageText1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Here is what I can help you with:.

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.MessageText2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to If you are curious about what I can do, just type @FAQBot and I will present the list of commands that I can understand..

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.ShareFeedbackTitleText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Share Feedback.

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.TakeATourButtonText
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Take a tour.

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.WelcomeText1
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hi there!.

member.name: P:FAQNABOT.Properties.Resource.WelcomeText2
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Hello! \nI am Sophia I am your friendly HR BOT. I am here to help you with your HR realted topics..
